alert.note: Alert for New Madrid; Scott; Stoddard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scott, north central New Madrid and east central Stoddard Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 526 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morehouse, or 8 miles west of Sikeston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sikeston around 530 PM CDT. Miner around 540 PM CDT. Morley and Hay-Wood City around 545 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 2. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 66 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri.
